700777f-a.title: Bronx: Bronx River Avenue - White Plains Road
700777f-a.text:
(1)
Clasons Point Amusement Park (Bronx): A view from
Bronx River Avenue at White Plains Road. In the center,
to the right of the tree, is the old Clasons Point Inn,
dating back to pre-Rovolutionary days.
July 29, 1928
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(2)
The same from a different angle. The view is north,
Stephens Avenue being on the right and Newman Avenue on the left.
July 29, 1928
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(3) Another section of the amusement center. The view
is south on the west side of Stephens Avenue, from Soundview
Avenue. Note the old Inn at the end of the street.
July 29, 1928
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
700777f-a.folder: Bronx River Avenue & White Plains Road, Bronx, NY
